EmailTemplate.description: Notify applicant that plan review approval is rescinded
EmailTemplate.name: POWTS Rescind Approval
EmailTemplate.subject: POWTS Previous Approval Rescinded
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!Today} Attn: [Inspector]
{!Contact.Client_Id__c}
Contact Name
Contact Address
Rescind Previous Approval
Identification Numbers
Transaction ID No.
Site ID No.
Please refer to both identification numbers, above, in all correspondence with the agency.
SITE:
FOR: {!MUSW__Permit2__c.Name}
The approval as described above has been RESCINDED.
The plan was accidentally approved and need some revision before it can be approved.
A copy of this correspondence is being sent to the local municipality so that, if necessary, appropriate action may be taken by the municipality with regard to any permits that were issued on the basis of the rescinded approval.
Inquiries should be directed to me at the phone number listed below, or the address shown on this letterhead. Please refer to Transaction ID No. shown in the regarding line when making reference to this correspondence.
Sincerely,
